sentences.en: a better-quality car
sentences.cn: 质量更好的汽车

sentences.en: Attlee had the better of these exchanges.
sentences.cn: 阿特利在这些辩论中占了上风。

sentences.en: Better not tangle with the censors. They're very vindictive.
sentences.cn: 最好别和检查员发生冲突，他们可爱记仇了。

sentences.en: Businesses need to train their workers better, and spend more on R&D.
sentences.cn: 各企业需要更好地培训工人，并且在研发方面加大投入。

sentences.en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
sentences.cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

sentences.en: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.cn: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

sentences.en: he leaned closer the better to hear her.
sentences.cn: 他侧身向她挨近以便听得更清楚些。

sentences.en: He liked the Secretary no better than his assistant.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌这位大臣的程度几乎和讨厌大臣的助理一样。

sentences.en: he'd lived there for better than twenty years.
sentences.cn: 他已在那里住了20多年。

sentences.en: He'd phoned Laura to see if she was better.
sentences.cn: 他打电话给劳拉看她是不是好些了。

sentences.en: I want to go one better this time and score.
sentences.cn: 我这次想做得好一些，能够得分。

sentences.en: It is better to stretch the tight muscles first.
sentences.cn: 最好先伸展一下僵硬的肌肉。

sentences.en: it is the better part of a mile.
sentences.cn: 这差不多有一英里。

sentences.en: It'd be better for a place like this to remain closed.
sentences.cn: 像这种地方最好一直关闭。

sentences.en: It's half past two. I think we had better go home.
sentences.cn: 现在两点半了。我想我们最好还是回家吧。

sentences.en: It’s hard to decide which one’s the better.
sentences.cn: 很难确定哪一个更好。

sentences.en: no one has ever got the better of her yet.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止还从未有人战胜过她。

sentences.en: She's got a great voice and is singing better than ever.
sentences.cn: 她的嗓音非常好，现在的唱功比以往任何时候都要好。

sentences.en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentences.cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentences.en: T-shirts are a nice little earner and it's better than the dole.
sentences.cn: 卖T恤衫来钱容易，比领救济金好。

sentences.en: The earlier the treatment is given, the better the patient's chances.
sentences.cn: 病人越早接受治疗，康复的可能性就越大。

sentences.en: the proposals would make her about £40 a year better off.
sentences.cn: 这些建议可以使她每年比以前多得40英镑。

sentences.en: the sooner we're off the better.
sentences.cn: 我们越早离开越好。

sentences.en: The train's average speed was no better than that of our bicycles.
sentences.cn: 火车的平均速度比我们骑自行车的速度快不了多少。

sentences.en: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.cn: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.en: viceroys who were often no better than bandits.
sentences.cn: 往往和盗匪无甚差别的总督大人们。

sentences.en: Whoops, it's past 11, I'd better be off home.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，11点多了，我最好还是回家吧。

sentences.en: you had better be careful.
sentences.cn: 你最好小心些。

sentences.en: You're miles better than most of the performers we see nowadays.
sentences.cn: 你比当下我们见到的大多数表演者都强多了。

sentences.en: Your bike will run better if you oil it.
sentences.cn: 你给自行车上点油就会更好骑。

sentences.en: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.cn: 你的音响比我的好。

words.tran_cn: 打赌，赌注；被打赌的事物
长辈；较好者；打赌的人（等于bettor）

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指经济情况）比以前好，比以前宽裕
(谚)谨言慎行不吃亏，轻率莽撞必后悔

phrases.phrase: better the devil you know than the devil you don't
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)（待人处世）做生不如做熟；宁与熟悉的坏人打交道，不与不知其底细者相处
取得对（某人）的优势；占（某人）的上风；击败（或胜过）…
最好做某事；应该做某事
有头脑；明事理；不会上当
与…如一丘之貉，半斤对八两
几乎等于；实际上和…一样

phrases.phrase: no better than one should (或 ought to) be
phrases.tran_cn: 被认为有多个性伴侣的，乱交的；被认为道德品质有问题的

trans.tran_cn: 更好的，能力更强的，更合适的，（病情）好转的
trans.tran_en: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
to a higher standard or quality
the one that is higher in quality, more suitable etc when you are comparing two similar people or things
more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
